page.title: 11A TYPICAL DAY FOR ALISTAIR
page.content: I wake at 7.30 in the morning & put my radio on,then doze for half an hour before the racket from the cockerel over the road eventually gets me out of bed.I dress ready for school in black trousers,blue shirt, grey socks and a grey jumper. After washing my hands & face I go downstairs for breakfast which is usually bacon, egg, sausages & bread followed by a cup of tea or coffee.Each morning at school we have an assembly followed by Maths and English. During the mid morning playtime I usually play football. At twelve o'clock we have school dinner which is usually delicious.Lessons in the afternoon include Art & craft, games, poetry, topic work & reading. When I return home I practice on my clarinet or go out to play before we have tea.We then watch television. Alistair Pearson Age 11 years.
